short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Front Page of your Internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Front Page New Tab grabs up-to-date links from your most visited news sites and displays them as a custom new tab page. Don’t already visit a lot of news sites? You can add as many as you’d like!

Features:

- Over 100 sites available for display in page
- Customize background
- Productivity Mode

This is a Beta version, so please be aware that this may have bugs. Please contact me at michael@micjm.com with any feedback or bug reports.
